title: Pete Davidson | Supreme Court Rules on LGBTQ Rights, Calls for Police Reform Grow: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the Supreme Court issuing a historic ruling on LGBTQ civil rights as officials across the country move toward police reform.

He then talks to Saturday Night Live cast member Pete Davidson about the new film he co-wrote and stars in, "The King of Staten Island."

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
